title: Before.The.Devil.Knows.you.are.Death
description:
Director:
Sidney Lumet (Find Me Guilty)

Main Attractions:
Philip Seymour Hoffman
Ethan Hawke

Synopsis:
Hoffman and Hawke play Andy and Hank, two brothers both
 in financial and marriage problems. To solve their entire
 monetary problem, Andy convinced Hank to pull a heist on
 their parentÃƒÂ¢??s jewelry store. When the robbery went 
haywire and lead to the death of one of their partner
 and their own mother, everything felt apart.

My Take:
The acting was good and the jumbled up depressing
 storyline, although a bit slow managed to interest.
 However, the only scenes resonating in my head was
 those with Marissa Tomei almost nude parading her goods.
